devdoc.author: Accelerate Finance
devdoc.details: Router contract for deploying RBF contracts and managing their settings.

constructor.details: Sets up the factories for RBF, escrow, and price feed while initializing the whitelist and threshold.

params._priceFeedFactory: Address of the price feed factory.
params._threshold: Minimum number of valid signatures required.
params._whiteLists: Array of addresses that are whitelisted for signing transactions.

deployRBF(bytes,bytes[]).details: Decodes the deployment data, verifies signatures, and deploys the RBF contract along with escrow and price feed.

params.rbfId: rbfId The unique identifier of the RBF contract.

getWhiteListsLen().details: This function is used to get the length of the whiteLists array.

returns._0: uint256  The length of the whiteLists array.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setWhiteListsAndThreshold(address[],uint.details: Only the contract owner can call this function. It first clears the existing whitelist,          then sets the new whitelist addresses and updates the required signature threshold.

params._threshold: Minimum number of valid signatures required for verification.
params._whiteLists: Array of new addresses to be whitelisted.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: RBFRouter

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the router with necessary parameters.

deployRBF(bytes,bytes[]).notice: Deploys a new RBF contract after verifying signatures.

getRBFInfo(uint64).notice: Retrieves information about a deployed RBF contract.

getWhiteListsLen().notice: Returns the length of the whiteLists array.

setWhiteListsAndThreshold(address[],uint.notice: Updates the whitelist of authorized signers and the signature threshold.

userdoc.notice: This contract facilitates the creation and management of RBF contracts, handling escrow and price feed deployment.
